sentences.cn: …位于田纳西州的一个大棉花种植园。

sentences.en: Because it was warm, David wore only a white cotton shirt.
sentences.cn: 因为天气暖和，戴维只穿了一件白色的棉衬衣。

sentences.en: Cotton prices remain firm and demand is strong.
sentences.cn: 棉花价格始终保持坚挺，需求旺盛。

sentences.en: He was wearing cotton pants and an open-necked shirt.
sentences.cn: 他穿着纯棉裤子和开领衬衫。

sentences.en: He wore brown corduroy pants and a white cotton shirt.
sentences.cn: 他身着棕色灯芯绒裤子和白色棉衬衫。

sentences.en: Her cotton dress had ripped down the front.
sentences.cn: 她的棉布连衣裙前面都扯裂了。

sentences.en: Last year's cotton crop was an unmitigated disaster.
sentences.cn: 去年棉花作物所遭遇的是彻头彻尾的灾难。

sentences.en: Microfibre fabrics are three times finer than cotton.
sentences.cn: 微纤维织物比棉布精细3倍。

sentences.en: Most of the rugs are simple cotton squares.
sentences.cn: 多数小地毯是简单的棉质方块垫。

sentences.en: Prices start at £13.95 a metre for printed cotton.
sentences.cn: 印花棉布以每米13.95英镑的价格起售。

sentences.en: She was wearing a pretty flowered cotton dress.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一件漂亮的印花棉布裙。

sentences.en: Smudge the outline using a cotton-wool bud.
sentences.cn: 用一根棉签把轮廓抹花。

sentences.en: Some of the food crops failed. However, the cotton did quite well.
sentences.cn: 有些粮食作物歉收。但棉花的收成仍相当不错。

sentences.en: There's a needle and cotton there.
They have been bartering wheat for cotton and timber.
sentences.cn: 他们一直用小麦交换棉花和木材。

sentences.en: Wipe off any excess make-up with a clean, moist cotton flannel.
sentences.cn: 用干净的湿绒布擦去多余的化妆品。

words.tran_cn: 棉的；像棉样的；起毛的；柔软的

phrases.tran_cn: 棉制品；棉纺织品；应交税的商品

trans.tran_en: cloth or thread made from the white hair of the cotton plant
